text: Ezɨ gumazir dapanir kaba uan mɨdorozir gumaziba inigha, me Gedalian ganasa Mispan ghue. Gumazir dapanir kabar ziabar kara: Netanian otarim Ismael ko, Karean otarimning Johanan ko Jonatan, ko Tanhumetɨn otarim Seraia ko, Netofan nguibamɨn gumazim Efain otariba ko, Makan nguazimɨn gumazim Jesania.
